title: New: xPRIESTx – Samurai
body:
Photo: Jennifer Medina

It’s always slightly bizarre when you receive an email from an artist that you’ve been waiting to find time to write about, but just haven’t quite got round to it yet.

Florida’s **xPRIESTx** aka Madeline Priest, Chandler Strang and David Kazyk have been sitting open in a tab on my MacBook for the past few days, just waiting for me to get round to penning a few words on their debut track. _Samurai_ is about as perfect as lo-fi pop comes, sugary synths and bittersweet vocals from Priest overlap with the stellar, ‘blog-friendly’ production. Check out _Samurai_ below.
